subject: Pass 4 pattern classification summary
body: Implemented Pass 4 classifier in scripts/ingest_calibre.py: LLM-based PatternTypeClassifier (gpt-4o-mini) classifies books into design|narrative|dynamic|embodied|identity|mixed using text sample + metadata; writes pattern_type, confidence, rationale to Book nodes. Updated UnifiedGraphClient schema version to 0.2.0 with pattern_type fields and helper update_book_pattern_type. Ingestion status view shows pattern type counts; summary logs classified count. Tests added: scripts/test_ingest_calibre.py (classifier parsing) and extended library/graph/tests/test_unified_client.py to cover new properties. No commits yet.
